description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Developing new business in renewable energy (making market research, initializing strateties, and execution)
              
              -	Management of vendors: follow-up of contract excecution, delivery, payment
              
              -	Reporting to General Director and General Manager
              
              -	Working time: Monday to Friday, 8:30 – 17:30
              
              -	Working location: Landmark Tower, 5B Ton Duc Thang, Dist.1,HCMC
              
              -	Business trip: Yes
              
              -	Working environment: small and friendly, within 10 people
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * REQUIREMENTS
              
              -	Level:  Manager
              
              -	Gender: male or female
              
              -	Age: 25-35y
              
              -	Education: bachelor degree or above
              
              -	Creative thinking
              
              -	Analytical skill
              
              -	Good understanding about legal issues, contracts
              
              -	Strong communication skills
              
              -	Competent in using MS Word, MS Excel, Powerpoint
              
              -	Willingness to travel overseas or domestically (eg. 01 week)
              
              -	Language: Advanced English (TOEIC 850 or equivalent)
              
              -	Experience: at least 2 year experience in required position, however experience in renewable energy is not required
              
              -	Recruitment process: 2 rounds including interview and writing test
              
              -	CV in English with latest picture
              

              * BENEFITS
              
              -	Monthly salary of minimum USD1500 (or higher depending on capabilities of candidate) plus 13th month salary
              
              -	Bonus depending on company business results
              
              -	All welfare allowances according to Vietnam Labor Law
              
              -	Premium health care plan
              
              -	Company mobile phone subsidization
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Monthly salary of minimum USD1500
               







                Premium health care plan
